definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)

sentences.english: From that day on, the Klatooinians were property of the Hutt criminal empire.
sentences.chinese: 從那以後，克拉圖因人便歸屬於赫特人的犯罪帝國。

sentences.english: after World Trade Center was knocked down.
sentences.chinese: 在世貿中心被炸燬以後。

sentences.english: We can talk about it all another time.
So the chemo finished. Then, blood began to appear in the patient's urine.
sentences.chinese: 後來，化療結束以後，病人出現了血尿。

sentences.english: If a new strategy works, then it will be adopted and further routinized as a rule of thumb.
sentences.chinese: 如果新辦法行得通，以後就會沿用而成爲經驗法則。

sentences.english: After making his tea, I asked if it would be all right if I visited him again .
sentences.chinese: 給他泡好茶之後，我問他以後是否可以再來拜訪。

sentences.english: I have a job interview in an hour and none of it is coming off.
sentences.chinese: 我一個小時以後要去面試，這些玩意怎麼也洗不掉。

sentences.english: After P3 generation, cells presented in uniform morphology.
sentences.chinese: P3代以後，細胞形態較單一。

sentences.english: TITANIA Perchance till after Theseus ' wedding-day.
sentences.chinese: 也許要到忒修斯的婚禮以後。

sentences.english: After that the struggle inside the party grew more acute.
sentences.chinese: 在那以後，黨內的鬥爭變得更加尖銳。

sentences.english: Of course, lots of cookies means some of them must be put away for later days.
sentences.chinese: 當然，大量的曲奇就意味着有一些會被留着以後再喫。

sentences.english: Yes, we have a two-room apartment free after the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 對，這個週末以後我們可以騰出一套兩居室的公寓。

sentences.english: From now on you are the official Statue of Liberty of this street.
sentences.chinese: 從今以後，你就是這條街上名正言順的自由神像。

sentences.english: The land has appreciated greatly since the new railway was buit.
sentences.chinese: 自從新鐵路築成以後，這塊地的價值大爲增高。

sentences.english: He would give entire earnings to Campbell's family from succeeding bouts.
sentences.chinese: 而他以後比賽的所有獎金將全部交給坎貝爾的家人。

sentences.english: After they moved the bag away, the girls let the traffic go again.
sentences.chinese: 等他們把口袋搬開以後，姑娘們再讓車輛通行。

definition: to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
as for/as to/to go so far as to
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
a while/a spell/a short time/a burst
